commit.message:
File field Bootstrap4: avoids long file names overflowing outside the… (#1032)

* File field Bootstrap4: avoids long file names overflowing outside the label

* Using h-auto to prevent vertical overflow, and text-break to prevent horizontal overflow

* Fixing text-break. cf https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap/issues/30803

* Using text-truncate to prevent long file name overflow

* refactor test to follow field_file.html evolution

* compliance with Black

* fixing regression, checkbox must float right

partial rollback of 8aaed1ba31cc279444a8fa42e8c6ac473bd438a7

Co-authored-by: Bryan Brancotte <bryan.brancotte@pasteur.fr>

verification.payload:
tree 2b9c35781f371346dc18b1e2cfdf4faff6f3cf66
parent 49e213b7a105e4bcd6254d0b920bc18bffb49908
author Carles Pina Estany <carles@pina.cat> 1592424823 +0200
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1592424823 +0100

File field Bootstrap4: avoids long file names overflowing outside the… (#1032)

* File field Bootstrap4: avoids long file names overflowing outside the label

* Using h-auto to prevent vertical overflow, and text-break to prevent horizontal overflow

* Fixing text-break. cf https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap/issues/30803

* Using text-truncate to prevent long file name overflow

* refactor test to follow field_file.html evolution

* compliance with Black

* fixing regression, checkbox must float right

partial rollback of 8aaed1ba31cc279444a8fa42e8c6ac473bd438a7

commit.message:
Added ClearableFileInput Rendering (#1004)

* Parsing the widget to get the initial data and render it properly
* prepend "Change" word from django widget when the field has an initial value
* Remove english sentence to have fully internationalized widget ui
* Make layout compatible with horizontal form
* use is-invalid BS4 css class
* Added documentation
* Added tests for file fields

Co-authored-by: David Smith <smithdc@gmail.com>

verification.payload:
tree 3e5d7d0325ca63016c8dacddd8a53b09e27f5bdb
parent 38841045b5f72147d38dc3447eb9c9c4fecd260f
author bryan brancotte <bryan.brancotte@pasteur.fr> 1589007402 +0200
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1589007402 +0100

Added ClearableFileInput Rendering (#1004)

* Parsing the widget to get the initial data and render it properly
* prepend "Change" word from django widget when the field has an initial value
* Remove english sentence to have fully internationalized widget ui
* Make layout compatible with horizontal form
* use is-invalid BS4 css class
* Added documentation
* Added tests for file fields

Co-authored-by: David Smith <smithdc@gmail.com>

commit.message:
Flake8 compatibility (#988)

Finalised compatibility with flake8 tests and added flake8 checking on pull requests.
To ensure flake8 tests passed changes included adding #noqa, removing commas and
other trivial formatting issues.

Flake8 compatibility (#988)

Finalised compatibility with flake8 tests and added flake8 checking on pull requests.
To ensure flake8 tests passed changes included adding #noqa, removing commas and
other trivial formatting issues.
